duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive sales and revenue growth through proactive business-to-business prospecting and relationship building.
Utilize persuasive communication and negotiation skills to close sales deals and secure long-term business relationships.
Maintain a hit list of potential clients and prioritize touch points to maximize sales opportunities.
Conduct in-depth business discussions to understand client needs and present effective solutions for promoting and selling products/services.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to manage client acquisition and simplify the sales process.
Manage client relationships to ensure future revenue growth and maximize renewal potential.
Effectively communicate and bring concepts to life in order to drive customer engagement and loyalty.
Participate in sales training and development programs to enhance sales skills and knowledge.
Apply persistent and compelling communication to achieve top sales performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
